gobblin.data.management.copy

Class RecursiveCopyableDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.RecursiveCopyableDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CopyableDataset, Dataset, FileSystemDataset

    public class RecursiveCopyableDataset
extends Object
implements CopyableDataset, FileSystemDataset
    Implementation of CopyableDataset that creates a CopyableFile for every file that is a descendant if the root directory.

    • Method Detail

      • getCopyableFiles

        public Collection<? extends CopyEntity> getCopyableFiles(FileSystem targetFs,
                                                         CopyConfiguration configuration)
                                                  throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: CopyableDataset
        Find all CopyEntitys in this dataset.

        This method should return a collection of CopyEntity, each describing one work unit for distcp. The most common CopyEntity is the CopyableDataset, describing a file that should be copied to the target. See CopyableFile for explanation of the information contained in the CopyableFiles.

        Specified by:
        getCopyableFiles in interface CopyableDataset
        Parameters:
        targetFs - target FileSystem where copied files will be placed.
        configuration - CopyConfiguration for this job. See CopyConfiguration.
        Returns:
        List of CopyEntitys in this dataset.
        Throws:
        IOException
